idea-plugin.name: Simple Translator
idea-plugin.description:
This is a plugin that allows you to translate texts from your IDE by hotkey.
In the settings you can choose languages and direction of translation.
Translate selected text with Alt + G hotkey
Change Yandex Translate API Key in Settings | Tools | Translator Settings
Also you can just press Alt + G without selecting text - Plugin will select the word on which the carriage stands or all line, or all block.
